When you access the Site or use the Service, we collect the following: Like many websites, we use "cookies" to collect information.
You authorize us to share your information with our Customer who owns such data and to any other third party with the prior consent of our customer who owns such data.

We also use "session ID cookies" to enable certain features of the Service, to better understand how you interact with the Service and to monitor web traffic routing on the Site and aggregate usage of the Service; these cookies disappear from your computer when you close your browser software or turn off your computer.
We use "persistent cookies" to save your username and login password for future logins to the Site; these cookies allow the Company to uniquely identify you when you are logged into the Service and remain on your computer after you close your browser or turn off your computer.
